Barometric pressure for APACHE II

APACHE, CONFIGURATION, Barometric = 747

The APACHE II score is based on various parameters, including the average barometric pressure. If your hospital is located in a region with an average barometric pressure that is different than the worldwide average at sea-level (747mm Hg), you should set the appropriate value.

Values

Local barometric pressure in mm Hg

Note: This setting does not affect derived real-time variables (such as A-aD02) that are calculated using the local barometric pressure; the barometric pressure value for derived real-time variables must be entered directly in the relevant fomula in the Click’n Link database table.
